vlive.korean: [공사 완료][꾸미기 완료] [동시에 말함] - 됐다! - 됐다! [Construction completed] [Decorating done] [Speaking at the same time] - Done! - I'm done! 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “JRTYLOG ④” (종현 : 태용)
vlive.english: [Construction completed] [Decorating done] [Speaking at the same time] - Done! - I'm done!

examples.korean: Work on the bridge will recommence next month. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 다리 공사는 다음 달에 재개될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
